question: My mother is aged 55. She is suffering stomach ache for the last 25 years. She suffer everyday long hours. She also has low BP. No history of diabetes. We did every possible checkups like endoscopy etc. everything turned out to be NORMAL in reports. She eats little food because it initiates the pain. Doctors say it irritable bowel syndrome, Grastrities etc .. Y'day she had 'zandu pancharista' -- she had swollen tongue and itches on the palms. May be allergy due to  'zandu pancharista'. Please help what is the remedy for her?
title: Stomach Pain
